# Fluke 75th Anniversary Student Sweepstakes

**Fluke 75th Anniversary Student Sweepstakes**

**Important:  Please read these Official Rules before entering this Sweepstakes (the “Sweepstakes”). By participating in this Sweepstakes, you agree to be bound by these Official Rules and represent that you satisfy all of the eligibility requirements below.**

**NO PURCHASE OR PAYMENT OF ANY KIND IS NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN THIS SWEEPSTAKES.**

Sweepstakes void where prohibited by law.  Subject to applicable federal, state, and local laws.

1.         **Eligibility**

For purposes of the Sweepstakes, a customer must be residents of and located in the 50 states of the United States or District of Columbia or Canada (excluding Quebec), 18 years of age or older, and must follow Fluke Electronics Corporation and/or Fluke Corporation on Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, or Twitter social media platforms.

Directors, officers, members, managers, and employees of Fluke Electronics Corporation in the United States and Fluke Electronics Limited Partnership in Canada (“Sponsor”), and any of its respective parent companies, affiliate companies, subsidiaries, agents, professional advisors, advertising, promotional, public relations, and fulfillment agencies, consultants, legal counsel, website providers, web masters, and immediate family members (spouses, parent, child, sibling, grandparent, and “step” child, wherever they may live) of each are not eligible to win any prize.  IF YOU DO NOT MEET ANY OF THESE REQUIREMENTS, OR ANY OTHER ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS IN THESE OFFICIAL RULES, YOU ARE NOT ELIGIBLE TO WIN A PRIZE.  To be eligible to win a prize, entries must be completed and received by Sponsor in the manner and format designated below.

2.         **Sweepstakes Period**

The Sweepstakes starts on November 20th 2023, and ends on December 1st 2023 (the “Sweepstakes Period”).  All entries must be received during the Sweepstakes Period and meet other requirements in these Official Rules to be eligible to win a prize.  Sponsor’s or its designee’s computer is the official time-keeping device for the Sweepstakes.

3.         **Instructions on How to Enter in the Sweepstakes**

To enter, during the Sweepstakes Period visit Fluke’s social media channels on LinkedIn, Facebook, and/or Twitter, and follow the instructions to enter the Sweepstakes .  .

4.         **Identity of Entrant**

Bulk or automated entries will be disqualified (including, for example, entries made using any script, macro, bot, or promotional service).  Multiple participants are not permitted to share the same email account.  Any attempt to obtain additional entries through fraud or other illegitimate means will result in disqualification, at Sponsor’s discretion.

In the event of a dispute about the identity of the entrant, entries will be declared made by the authorized account holder of the email address submitted with the Form answers.  An “authorized account holder” means the natural person who is assigned to an e-mail address by an Internet access provider, online service provider or other organization (e.g., business, educational institution, etc.) that is responsible for assigning e-mail addresses for the domain associated with the submitted e-mail address.  A potential winner may be required to provide Sponsor with proof that a potential winner is the authorized account holder of the account associated with the winning entry.

5.         **Selection and Notification of Winner**

On or around 2nd December 2023, Sponsor will select the names of seven (7) potential winners of the prizes in a random drawing from among all eligible entries at Sponsor’s headquarters as listed in Section 13 below.  The odds of winning depend on the number of eligible entries received.

Each potential winner will be notified via direct message on the platform on which they entered.  To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, Sponsor may require each potential winner to sign and return, within five (5) days of being notified, an Affidavit of Eligibility and Liability/Publicity Release in order to claim his/her/their prize.  If (i) the attempted notification is returned as undeliverable without a forwarding address; (ii) any required documents are not returned within five (5) days, such as the Affidavit of Eligibility and Liability/Publicity Release; or (iii) if potential winner is otherwise unable to accept the prize as stated, the prize will be forfeited and may be awarded to an alternate winner.  Only one alternate drawing will be held, after which the remaining prizes will not be awarded.  If, by reason of a print or other error, more prizes are claimed than the number set forth in these Official Rules, an alternate winner will be selected in accordance with the above selection process from among all eligible claimants making purportedly valid claims to award the prizes available.

Verification of Potential Winner:  EACH POTENTIAL WINNER IS SUBJECT TO VERIFICATION BY SPONSOR, WHOSE DECISIONS ARE FINAL AND BINDING IN ALL MATTERS RELATED TO THE SWEEPSTAKES.  AN ENTRANT IS NOT A PRIZE WINNER UNLESS AND UNTIL ENTRANT’S ELIGIBILITY HAS BEEN VERIFIED AND ENTRANT HAS BEEN NOTIFIED THAT VERIFICATION IS COMPLETE AND NO FURTHER ACTION IS NEEDED.

6.         **Prize**

Seven (7) winners will each one package of 75th Anniversary special: backpack, hat, sticker, lapel pin, and T6-1000 Electrical Tester w/ FieldSense. Approximate Retail Value (“ARV”) of each prize package: $480 USD.

Prize Restrictions: ALL FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL TAXES ASSOCIATED WITH THE RECEIPT OR USE OF ANY PRIZE ARE THE SOLE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE WINNER.  Prizes are not transferable.  No substitutions or exchanges of prize (including for cash) will be permitted, except that Sponsor reserves the right to substitute a prize of comparable or greater value for any prize.  Sponsor will not replace any lost or stolen prizes or prize components. Only the number of prizes stated in these Official Rules are available to be won in the Sweepstakes.

Except for applicable manufacturer’s standard warranties, the prizes are awarded “AS IS” and WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, express or implied (including, without limitation, any implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose).

7.         **Use of Use of Winner's Name, Likeness, etc.**

Except where prohibited by law, entry into the Sweepstakes constitutes permission to use each winner’s name, hometown, aural and visual likeness and prize information for advertising, marketing, and promotional purposes without further permission or compensation (including in a public-facing winner list).  As a condition of being awarded any prize, except where prohibited by law, winner may be required to execute a consent to the use of their name, hometown, aural and visual likeness and prize information for advertising, marketing, and promotional purposes without further permission or compensation.  By entering this Sweepstakes, you consent to being contacted by Sponsor for any purpose in connection with this Sweepstakes.

8.         **Assignment of Rights in Form Answers/No Confidentiality**

Entry materials and Forms will not be returned to entrants.  By entering the Sweepstakes, you hereby assign all right, title, and interest in your Form answers to Sponsor, including without limitation all associated copyright, trademark, patent, and other proprietary rights therein. Without limiting the foregoing, you acknowledge that Sponsor will own all rights to use, adapt, edit, modify, translate, reproduce, publish, perform, display, distribute, make derivative works of and otherwise commercially and non-commercially exploit concepts, ideas, and  improvements in your Form answers in perpetuity and throughout the world, in any manner or medium now existing or later developed, without separate compensation to you or any other person or entity.  You agree to take, at Sponsor's expense, any further action (including executing documents) requested by Sponsor to effect, perfect or confirm the Sponsor rights set forth in this paragraph.

By entering this Sweepstakes, you realize that Sponsor may have access to, or may independently create content, product improvements, and material similar or identical to, the information provided in your Form answers, and you agree that you will not be entitled to any compensation by reason of the use by Sponsor of such similar or identical material.  You understand and agree that all Form answers submitted to Sponsor will not be treated as confidential, and you agree not to include or disclose any trade secrets or other confidential or proprietary information in any Form answers.

9. **Winner List; Rules Request**

For a copy of the winner list, send an email to [reply@fluke.com](mailto:reply@fluke.com) after first week of December , Attn: Fluke 75th Anniversary Sweepstakes.  To obtain a copy of these Official Rules, visit [https://lnk.bio/fluke](https://lnk.bio/fluke "(opens in a new window)").

10.       **Disclaimer**

Sponsor and each of its parent companies, subsidiaries, and affiliates, and each of their respective directors, officers, equity owners, professional advisors, distributors, representatives, employees and agents (collectively, the “Released Parties”) will not be responsible or have any liability for: (a) any late, lost, misrouted, garbled or distorted or damaged communications, transmissions or requests; (b) telephone, electronic, hardware, software, network, Internet, or other computer- or communications-related malfunctions or failures; (c) any Sweepstakes disruptions, injuries, losses or damages caused by events beyond the control of Sponsor or by non-authorized human or other intervention; or (d) any printing or typographical errors in any materials associated with the Sweepstakes.

Sponsor and the Released Parties are not responsible for: (a) authorized distributors that do not participate in the Sweepstakes; (b) participating authorized distributors that sell products at the price they determine; or (c) participating authorized distributors mishandling transactions and/or shipments of product.

11.       **Limitation of Liability**

Except where otherwise prohibited by law, by participating in the Sweepstakes, you release and agree to indemnify and hold harmless each Released Party from any liability, obligation, injury, claim, suit, action, cost, expense, loss or damage of any kind, including any tax liability or loss of opportunity, whether direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential, that may be imposed on, asserted against or incurred by such Released Party that arise out of or relate in any way to this Sweepstakes and the gifts offered hereunder, including, but not limited to, where arising out of or relating to the following: (a) any technical difficulties or equipment malfunction (whether or not under Sponsor’s control); (b) any theft, unauthorized access or third party interference; (c) any redemption request that is late, lost, altered, damaged or misdirected (whether or not after their receipt by Sponsor, and whether or not in Sponsor’s control); (d) any damages due to the operation of the postal service; (e) any variation in Sweepstakes value to that stated in these terms and conditions; (f) any tax liability incurred by participant; or (g) use or misuse of the products offered under the Sweepstakes.

12.       **Miscellaneous**

The Sweepstakes and these terms and conditions will be governed, construed and interpreted under the laws of the State of Washington, USA without applying any conflicts or choice of law provisions under such law that might refer the construction or interpretation of any term hereof to the laws of any other jurisdiction.  Any action brought regarding the Sweepstakes and these terms and conditions may only be brought in the state or federal courts located in the State of Washington, and each party to such action expressly consents to jurisdiction of those courts.  If any provision of these terms and conditions is held illegal or unenforceable in a judicial proceeding, such provision shall be severed and shall be inoperative, and, provided that the fundamental terms and conditions of these terms and conditions remain legal and enforceable, the remainder of these terms and conditions shall remain operative and binding.

The customer is bound by these terms and conditions and by the decisions of Sponsor, which are final and binding in all respects. # U.S. shipping rates and information

All U.S. orders on Fluke.com receive free 2-Day shipping. We are only able to ship orders with billing and shipping addresses in the United States.

**How does 2-Day shipping work?**

Most of our orders ship within 1-2 business days. Please note, calibrated and build-to-order products have longer lead times, as shown on the product pages. Orders for items that are out of stock, or available as a pre-order, are placed in the queue and shipped when they become available.

Deliveries are scheduled for business days, so please allow for additional shipping time.

Actual delivery dates depend on order cutoff times and carrier delivery schedules. Deliveries can be delayed by service disruptions or if incomplete/inaccurate address and contact information was submitted with the order. Items that require a signature for delivery will be delayed if no one is available to receive the shipment.

Once the order has shipped an email notification with tracking information will be sent to the email address associated to the order.

**Terms & Conditions**

View Fluke's [Terms and Conditions](https://shop.fluke.com/pages/terms-and-conditions "(opens in a new window)")

# 75th-anniversary-fall-promotion

![Fluke 75th Anniversary FALL Promotion](https://dam-assets.fluke.com/s3fs-public/flk-230102-en-emea-H2-75-yrs-promo-banner-600x200.gif)

Welcome to Fluke's 75th Anniversary FALL Promotion!

As pioneers in the industry for 75 years, we thank you -our valued customers- for your trust. To show our gratitude, we are offering exclusive discounts on top-tier test and measurement products. Experience Fluke's unmatched durability and trusted accuracy with the most advanced tools in the industry. Join us in marking this milestone and be part of our success story!

Promotion valid October 1, 2023 - December 31, 2023

Save: 26%

[English](https://www.fluke.com/en-us/fluke/393-august-sweepstakes#country-picker-mobile)

Search

# Fluke 393 Solar Clamp Meter August Sweepstakes

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

**Important:  Please read these Official Rules before entering this Sweepstakes (the “ _Sweepstakes_”). By participating in this Sweepstakes, you agree to be bound by these Official Rules and represent that you satisfy all of the eligibility requirements below.**

**NO PURCHASE OR PAYMENT OF ANY KIND IS NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN THIS SWEEPSTAKES.**

Sweepstakes void where prohibited by law.  Subject to applicable federal, state, and local laws.

1. **Eligibility**

For purposes of the Sweepstakes, a customer must be resident of the 50 United States or D.C (excluding Puerto Rico), 18 years or old, and must follow Fluke Electronics Corporation and/or Fluke Corporation on Instagram, Facebook, or Twitter.

Directors, officers, members, managers, and employees of Fluke Electronics Corporation in the United States (“Sponsor”), and any of its respective parent companies, affiliate companies, subsidiaries, agents, professional advisors, advertising, promotional, public relations, and fulfillment agencies, consultants, legal counsel, website providers, web masters, and immediate family members (spouses, parent, child, sibling, grandparent, and “step” child, wherever they may live) of each are not eligible to win any prize.  IF YOU DO NOT MEET ANY OF THESE REQUIREMENTS, OR ANY OTHER ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS IN THESE OFFICIAL RULES, YOU ARE NOT ELIGIBLE TO WIN A PRIZE.  To be eligible to win a prize, entries must be completed and received by Sponsor in the manner and format designated below.

1. **Sweepstakes Period**

The Sweepstakes starts at 12:00 a.m. Pacific Time (PT) on 15th August 2022 and ends at 11:59 p.m. (PT) on 31st August 2022 (the “Sweepstakes Period”).  All entries must be received during the Sweepstakes Period and meet other requirements in these Official Rules to be eligible to win a prize.  Sponsor’s or its designee’s computer is the official time-keeping device for the Sweepstakes.

1. **Instructions on How to Enter in the Sweepstakes**

To enter, during the Sweepstakes Period visit [https://www.instagram.com/flukecorp/](https://www.instagram.com/flukecorp/ "(opens in a new window)"), [https://www.facebook.com/fluke.corporation/](https://www.facebook.com/fluke.corporation/ "(opens in a new window)"), or [https://twitter.com/FlukeCorp](https://twitter.com/FlukeCorp "(opens in a new window)"), and follow the instructions to enter the Sweepstakes by liking, sharing or commenting on the Sweepstakes post.  Upon completion of these steps, you will receive one entry into the Sweepstakes.  Limit one entry per person during Sweepstakes Period.  Any attempts to obtain additional entries, including through multiple or duplicate accounts will result in disqualification.

1. **Identity of Entrant**

Bulk or automated entries will be disqualified (including, for example, entries made using any script, macro, bot, or promotional service).  Multiple participants are not permitted to share the same email account.  Any attempt to obtain additional entries through fraud or other illegitimate means will result in disqualification, at Sponsor’s discretion.

In the event of a dispute about the identity of the entrant, entries will be declared made by the authorized account holder of the email address submitted with the Form answers.  An “ **_authorized account holder_**” means the natural person who is assigned to an e-mail address by an Internet access provider, online service provider or other organization (e.g., business, educational institution, etc.) that is responsible for assigning e-mail addresses for the domain associated with the submitted e-mail address.  A potential winner may be required to provide Sponsor with proof that a potential winner is the authorized account holder of the account associated with the winning entry.

1. **Selection and Notification of Winner**

On or about 5th September 2022, Sponsor will select the names of one potential winner of the prize in a random drawing from among all eligible entries at Sponsor’s headquarters as listed in Section 16 below **.**  The odds of winning depend on the number of eligible entries received.

Each potential winner will be notified via direct message on the platform on which they entered on or about 6th August 2022.  To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, Sponsor may require each potential winner to sign and return, within five days of being notified, an Affidavit of Eligibility and Liability/Publicity Release in order to claim his/her prize.  If (i) the attempted notification is returned as undeliverable without a forwarding address; (ii) any required documents are not returned within five days, such as the Affidavit of Eligibility and Liability/Publicity Release; or (iii) if potential winner is otherwise unable to accept the prize as stated, the prize will be forfeited and may be awarded to an alternate winner.  Only one alternate drawings will be held, after which the remaining prizes will not be awarded.  If, by reason of a print or other error, more prizes are claimed than the number set forth in these Official Rules, an alternate winner will be selected in accordance with the above selection process from among all eligible claimants making purportedly valid claims to award the prizes available.

Verification of Potential Winner:  EACH POTENTIAL WINNER IS SUBJECT TO VERIFICATION BY SPONSOR, WHOSE DECISIONS ARE FINAL AND BINDING IN ALL MATTERS RELATED TO THE SWEEPSTAKES.  AN ENTRANT IS NOT A PRIZE WINNER UNLESS AND UNTIL ENTRANT’S ELIGIBILITY HAS BEEN VERIFIED AND ENTRANT HAS BEEN NOTIFIED THAT VERIFICATION IS COMPLETE AND NO FURTHER ACTION IS NEEDED.

1. **Prize**

One winner will receive one Fluke 393 FC Solar Clamp Meter.  Approximate Retail Value (“ARV”) of Fluke FC 393 Solar Clamp Meter is: $729.99.  One winner will be selected from entrants who entered to win via Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.  Entering across Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter does not increase your chances of winning.

Prize Restrictions: ALL FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL TAXES ASSOCIATED WITH THE RECEIPT OR USE OF ANY PRIZE ARE THE SOLE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE WINNER.  Prizes are not transferable.  No substitutions or exchanges of prize (including for cash) will be permitted, except that Sponsor reserves the right to substitute a prize of comparable or greater value for any prize.  Sponsor will not replace any lost or stolen prizes or prize components. Only the number of prizes stated in these Official Rules are available to be won in the Sweepstakes.

Except for applicable manufacturer’s standard warranties, the prizes are awarded “AS IS” and WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, express or implied (including, without limitation, any implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose).

1. **Use of Use of Winner's Name, Likeness, etc.**

Except where prohibited by law, entry into the Sweepstakes constitutes permission to use each winner’s name, hometown, aural and visual likeness and prize information for advertising, marketing, and promotional purposes without further permission or compensation (including in a public-facing winner list).  As a condition of being awarded any prize, except where prohibited by law, winner may be required to execute a consent to the use of their name, hometown, aural and visual likeness and prize information for advertising, marketing, and promotional purposes without further permission or compensation.  By entering this Sweepstakes, you consent to being contacted by Sponsor for any purpose in connection with this Sweepstakes.

1. **Assignment of Rights in Form Answers/No Confidentiality**

Entry materials and Forms will not be returned to entrants.  By entering the Sweepstakes, you hereby assign all right, title, and interest in your Form answers to Sponsor, including without limitation all associated copyright, trademark, patent, and other proprietary rights therein. Without limiting the foregoing, you acknowledge that Sponsor will own all rights to use, adapt, edit, modify, translate, reproduce, publish, perform, display, distribute, make derivative works of and otherwise commercially and non-commercially exploit concepts, ideas, and  improvements in your Form answers in perpetuity and throughout the world, in any manner or medium now existing or later developed, without separate compensation to you or any other person or entity.  You agree to take, at Sponsor's expense, any further action (including executing documents) requested by Sponsor to effect, perfect or confirm the Sponsor rights set forth in this paragraph.

By entering this Sweepstakes, you realize that Sponsor may have access to, or may independently create content, product improvements, and material similar or identical to, the information provided in your Form answers, and you agree that you will not be entitled to any compensation by reason of the use by Sponsor of such similar or identical material.  You understand and agree that all Form answers submitted to Sponsor will not be treated as confidential, and you agree not to include or disclose any trade secrets or other confidential or proprietary information in any Form answers.

1. **Winner List; Rules Request**

For a copy of the winner list, send an email to reply@fluke.com after 5th August 2022 and before 1st September 2022 to the address listed in Section 13 below, Attn: 393 Solar Clamp Meter Sweepstakes.  To obtain a copy of these Official Rules, visit [https://lnk.bio/fluke](https://lnk.bio/fluke "(opens in a new window)").

1. **Disclaimer**

Sponsor and each of its parent companies, subsidiaries, and affiliates, and each of their respective directors, officers, equity owners, professional advisors, distributors, representatives, employees and agents (collectively, the “Released Parties”) will not be responsible or have any liability for: (a) any late, lost, misrouted, garbled or distorted or damaged communications, transmissions or requests; (b) telephone, electronic, hardware, software, network, Internet, or other computer- or communications-related malfunctions or failures; (c) any Sweepstakes disruptions, injuries, losses or damages caused by events beyond the control of Sponsor or by non-authorized human or other intervention; or (d) any printing or typographical errors in any materials associated with the Sweepstakes.

Sponsor and the Released Parties are not responsible for: (a) authorized distributors that do not participate in the Sweepstakes; (b) participating authorized distributors that sell products at the price they determine; or (c) participating authorized distributors mishandling transactions and/or shipments of product.

1. **Limitation of Liability**

Except where otherwise prohibited by law, by participating in the Sweepstakes, you release and agree to indemnify and hold harmless each Released Party from any liability, obligation, injury, claim, suit, action, cost, expense, loss or damage of any kind, including any tax liability or loss of opportunity, whether direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential, that may be imposed on, asserted against or incurred by such Released Party that arise out of or relate in any way to this Sweepstakes and the gifts offered hereunder, including, but not limited to, where arising out of or relating to the following: (a) any technical difficulties or equipment malfunction (whether or not under Sponsor’s control); (b) any theft, unauthorized access or third party interference; (c) any redemption request that is late, lost, altered, damaged or misdirected (whether or not after their receipt by Sponsor, and whether or not in Sponsor’s control); (d) any damages due to the operation of the postal service; (e) any variation in Sweepstakes value to that stated in these terms and conditions; (f) any tax liability incurred by participant; or (g) use or misuse of the products offered under the Sweepstakes.

1. **Miscellaneous**

The Sweepstakes and these terms and conditions will be governed, construed and interpreted under the laws of the State of Washington, USA without applying any conflicts or choice of law provisions under such law that might refer the construction or interpretation of any term hereof to the laws of any other jurisdiction.  Any action brought regarding the Sweepstakes and these terms and conditions may only be brought in the state or federal courts located in the State of Washington, and each party to such action expressly consents to jurisdiction of those courts.  If any provision of these terms and conditions is held illegal or unenforceable in a judicial proceeding, such provision shall be severed and shall be inoperative, and, provided that the fundamental terms and conditions of these terms and conditions remain legal and enforceable, the remainder of these terms and conditions shall remain operative and binding.

The customer is bound by these terms and conditions and by the decisions of Sponsor, which are final and binding in all respects. To the extent permitted by law, Sponsor reserves the right to change these terms and conditions at any time, in its sole and absolute discretion, and to suspend or cancel the Sweepstakes or any customer’s participation in the Sweepstakes should technical failures, computer viruses, fraud, human error, unauthorized human intervention or other causes beyond Sponsor’s control affect the administration, security, proper functioning, integrity or conduct of the Sweepstakes, Sponsor otherwise becomes (as determined in its sole and absolute discretion) incapable of conducting the Sweepstakes as planned, or for any other reason determined by Sponsor to be appropriate in its sole and absolute discretion.

These terms and conditions constitute the entire agreement governing the Sweepstakes and binding the customer, and no other agreement, verbal or otherwise, shall be binding regarding the Sweepstakes unless it is in writing and signed by Sponsor.  In case of any conflict or inconsistency between any other documents relating to the Sweepstakes and these terms and conditions, these terms and conditions shall control.  To the maximum extent provided by law, no waiver of any provision of these terms and conditions will be implied from any course of dealings between the customer and Sponsor or from any failure by the customer or Sponsor to assert its rights hereunder on any occasion or a series of occasions. Eligibility to participate in the Sweepstakes is non-transferable and non-assignable.

Any customer who violates these terms and conditions, violates any law, rule or regulation in connection with participation in the Sweepstakes, tampers with the operation of the Sweepstakes, or engages in any conduct that is unsportsmanlike, disruptive, or detrimental or unfair to Sponsor, the Sweepstakes or any other participant (in each case as determined in Sponsor’s sole and absolute discretion) are subject to disqualification from participation in the Sweepstakes and all other rights and remedies available under the law.

Sponsor’s use of the customer’s personal information provided to Sponsor is subject to Sponsor's Privacy Policy (available at [http://en-us.fluke.com/site/privacy](http://en-us.fluke.com/site/privacy "(opens in a new window)")). If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions or the Sweepstakes, please email them to reply@fluke.com.

1. **Sponsor’s Address Information**

Fluke Electronics Corporation, 6920 Seaway Blvd, Everett, WA 98203, United States

1. **Copyright Notice**

The Sweepstakes and all accompanying materials, including these Terms & Conditions, are copyright © 2022 by Fluke Corporation.  All rights reserved.

# Fluke New Solar Product Giveaway

## **TERMS AND CONDITIONS**

1. **Promotion Description**

Eligible customers who participate in this Fluke Industry Leading Solar Product Giveaway (the “Promotion”) during the Promotion Period (as defined in Section 3) and meet all the requirements as set forth in these terms and conditions of the Promotion are eligible to win either the new product as further described below or one of four (4) Fluke TB25 Tool Buckets.

Under the Promotion, eligible end customers of Fluke Electronics Corporation (“Sponsor”) who register to receive pre-launch updates and solar content will be entered into a drawing to win a new, to be released Fluke Solar product.

1. **Eligibility**

For purposes of the Promotion, a customer must be at least 18 years of age, and a resident of the 50 United States or District of Columbia (excluding Puerto Rico).

Only customers that are end-users and use solar tools for their own purposes are eligible to participate in the Promotion. Distributors, resellers, and similar parties are expressly excluded from participation in the Promotion.

Employees, directors and officers of the Sponsor, its parent companies, affiliated companies, subsidiaries, distributors, representatives, and those persons’ immediate families (parents, siblings, children, and spouse) and persons living in the same household (whether related or not) are not eligible to participate in the Promotion. Further, no employees, officers, directors, representatives, or agents of (i) government entities, including government owned or controlled companies, (ii) distributors or (iii) competing tool manufacturers are eligible to participate in the Promotion.

1. **Promotion Period**

In order to qualify for the Promotion, an eligible customer must register to receive Fluke Solar content and updates for the new, to be released product during the Promotion Period, which starts at 12:00 AM Pacific Standard Time on Tuesday, February 20, 2024, and ends at 11:59 PM Pacific Standard Time on Tuesday, March 19, 2024 (the “Promotion Period”).

1. **Instructions on How to Participate in the Promotion**

In order to entry the giveaway drawing under the Promotion, all eligible customers must follow the process stated below during the Promotion Period.

- Visit (Landing Page)
- Enter your name and email address
- Hit Submit
- Receive pre-launch updates and exclusive solar content from Fluke

1. **Winner Selection and Notification**

Within two weeks of the completion of the Entry Period, one (1) potential winner will be selected in a random drawing from all eligible entries received during the Entry Period. The drawing will be conducted by Fluke Corporation or its designated representatives, whose decisions are final.

The potential winner will be notified by email or phone within five (5) business days following the winner selection. Fluke Corporation shall have no liability for a winner's failure to receive notices due to spam, junk e-mail, or other security settings or for a winner’s provision of incorrect or otherwise non-functioning contact information.

The potential winner must respond to the notification within seven (7) days of notification. Failure to respond within the designated timeframe may result in disqualification, and an alternate winner may be selected.

1. **Restrictions and Limitations of the Promotion**

The Promotion is subject to all applicable federal, state, and local laws and regulations and is void where prohibited by law. The Promotion is also void in the United States territories and possessions and all other countries not listed in Section 2.

At its sole discretion, Sponsor may offer to substitute a free product of equal or higher value if new, to be release product does not become available.

No cash substitutes are allowed for any reason.

1. **Disclaimer**

Sponsor and each of its parent companies, subsidiaries, and affiliates, and each of their respective directors, officers, equity owners, professional advisors, distributors, representatives, employees and agents (collectively, the “Released Parties”) will not be responsible or have any liability for: (a) any late, lost, misrouted, garbled or distorted or damaged communications, transmissions or requests; (b) telephone, electronic, hardware, software, network, Internet, or other computer- or communications-related malfunctions or failures; (c) any Promotion disruptions, injuries, losses or damages caused by events beyond the control of Sponsor or by non-authorized human or other intervention; or (d) any printing or typographical errors in any materials associated with the Promotion.

1. **Limitation of Liability**

Except where otherwise prohibited by law, by participating in the Promotion, you release and agree to indemnify and hold harmless each Released Party from any liability, obligation, injury, claim, suit, action, cost, expense, loss or damage of any kind, including any tax liability or loss of opportunity, whether direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential, that may be imposed on, asserted against or incurred by such Released Party that arise out of or relate in any way to this Promotion and the giveaway offered hereunder, including, but not limited to, where arising out of or relating to the following: (a) any technical difficulties or equipment malfunction (whether or not under Sponsor’s control); (b) any theft, unauthorized access or third party interference; (c) any tax liability incurred by participant; or (g) use or misuse of the product offered under the Promotion.

1. **Tax Liability**

The winner of the new product Giveaway is solely responsible for any and all taxes associated with the receipt and use of the prize, including but not limited to federal, state, and local taxes.

Fluke Corporation will provide the winner of the new product with an IRS Form 1099 reporting the value of the prize for tax purposes. The winner agrees to provide any necessary information to Fluke Corporation to facilitate compliance with tax reporting requirements.

1. **Opt Outs**

If you have been selected as the winner of the Fluke New Solar Product Giveaway and wish to decline the prize, you must notify Fluke Corporation within seven (7) days of receiving the winner notification. To opt out of accepting the prize, please send an email to \[fluke-info@fluke.com\] with the subject line "Opt Out - Fluke Solar Product Giveaway." In your email, include your full name, contact information, and a statement expressing your decision to decline the prize.

By opting out of accepting the prize, you acknowledge that you will forfeit any rights to the prize, and Fluke Corporation will proceed to select an alternate winner in accordance with the terms and conditions of the giveaway.

Please note that once you have opted out and an alternate winner has been selected, you will not be eligible to receive the prize or any other compensation from Fluke Corporation in connection with the giveaway.

If you do not notify us of your decision to opt out within the designated timeframe, you will be deemed to have accepted the prize, and you will be subject to all obligations and responsibilities associated with being the winner of the Fluke Corporation Product Giveaway.

1. **Miscellaneous**

The Promotion and these terms and conditions will be governed, construed, and interpreted under the laws of the State of Washington, USA without applying any conflicts or choice of law provisions under such law that might refer the construction or interpretation of any term hereof to the laws of any other jurisdiction. Any action brought regarding the Promotion and these terms and conditions may only be brought in the state or federal courts located in the State of Washington, and each party to such action expressly consents to jurisdiction of those courts. If any provision of these terms and conditions is held illegal or unenforceable in a judicial proceeding, such provision shall be severed and shall be inoperative, and, provided that the fundamental terms and conditions of these terms and conditions remain legal and enforceable, the remainder of these terms and conditions shall remain operative and binding.

The customer is bound by these terms and conditions and by the decisions of Sponsor, which are final and binding in all respects. To the extent permitted by law, Sponsor reserves the right to change these terms and conditions at any time, in its sole and absolute discretion, and to suspend or cancel the Promotion or any customer’s participation in the Promotion should technical failures, computer viruses, fraud, human error, unauthorized human intervention or other causes beyond Sponsor’s control affect the administration, security, proper functioning, integrity or conduct of the Promotion, Sponsor otherwise becomes (as determined in its sole and absolute discretion) incapable of conducting the Promotion as planned, or for any other reason determined by Sponsor to be appropriate in its sole and absolute discretion.

These terms and conditions constitute the entire agreement governing the Promotion and binding the customer, and no other agreement, verbal or otherwise, shall be binding regarding the Promotion unless it is in writing and signed by Sponsor. In case of any conflict or inconsistency between any other documents relating to the Promotion and these terms and conditions, these terms and conditions shall control. To the maximum extent provided by law, no waiver of any provision of these terms and conditions will be implied from any course of dealings between the customer and Sponsor or from any failure by the customer or Sponsor to assert its rights hereunder on any occasion or a series of occasions. Eligibility to participate in the Promotion is non-transferable and non-assignable.

Any customer who violates these terms and conditions, violates any law, rule or regulation in connection with participation in the Promotion, tampers with the operation of the Promotion, or engages in any conduct that is unsportsmanlike, disruptive, or detrimental or unfair to Sponsor, the Promotion or any other participant (in each case as determined in Sponsor’s sole and absolute discretion) are subject to disqualification from participation in the Promotion and all other rights and remedies available under the law.

Sponsor’s use of the customer’s personal information provided to Sponsor is subject to Sponsor's Privacy Policy (available at http://en-us.fluke.com/site/privacy). If you have any questions about these terms and conditions or the Promotion, please email them to fluke-info@fluke.com or send written questions to the address: ATTN: Fluke Solar Product Giveaway Team 6920 Seaway Blvd., Everett, WA 98203.

1. **Sponsor’s Address Information**

Fluke Electronics Corporation, 6920 Seaway Blvd., Everett, WA 98203. Fluke

1. **Copyright Notice**

The Promotion and all accompanying materials, including these terms and conditions, are copyright © 2024 by Fluke Corporation. All rights reserved.

# Fluke 393 Solar Clamp Meter October Sweepstakes

**Important:  Please read these Official Rules before entering this Sweepstakes (the “Sweepstakes”). By participating in this Sweepstakes, you agree to be bound by these Official Rules and represent that you satisfy all of the eligibility requirements below.**

**NO PURCHASE OR PAYMENT OF ANY KIND IS NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN THIS SWEEPSTAKES.**

Sweepstakes void where prohibited by law.  Subject to applicable federal, state, and local laws.

1.         **Eligibility**

For purposes of the Sweepstakes, a customer must be resident of the 50 United States or D.C (excluding Puerto Rico) or Canada (excluding Quebec), 18 years or old, and must follow Fluke Electronics Corporation and/or Fluke Corporation on Instagram.

Directors, officers, members, managers, and employees of Fluke Electronics Corporation in the United States and Fluke Electronics Limited Partnership in Canada (“Sponsor”), and any of its respective parent companies, affiliate companies, subsidiaries, agents, professional advisors, advertising, promotional, public relations, and fulfillment agencies, consultants, legal counsel, website providers, web masters, and immediate family members (spouses, parent, child, sibling, grandparent, and “step” child, wherever they may live) of each are not eligible to win any prize.  IF YOU DO NOT MEET ANY OF THESE REQUIREMENTS, OR ANY OTHER ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS IN THESE OFFICIAL RULES, YOU ARE NOT ELIGIBLE TO WIN A PRIZE.  To be eligible to win a prize, entries must be completed and received by Sponsor in the manner and format designated below.

2.         **Sweepstakes Period**

The Sweepstakes starts at 12:00 a.m. Pacific Time (PT) on 1st October 2022 and ends at 11:59 p.m. (PT) on 31st October 2022 (the “Sweepstakes Period”).  All entries must be received during the Sweepstakes Period and meet other requirements in these Official Rules to be eligible to win a prize.  Sponsor’s or its designee’s computer is the official time-keeping device for the Sweepstakes.

3.         **Instructions on How to Enter in the Sweepstakes**

To enter, during the Sweepstakes Period visit [https://www.instagram.com/flukecorp/](https://www.instagram.com/flukecorp/ "(opens in a new window)") and follow the instructions to enter the Sweepstakes by liking, sharing or commenting on the Sweepstakes post.  Upon completion of these steps, you will receive one (1) entry into the Sweepstakes.

Limit one (1) entry per person during Sweepstakes Period.  Any attempts to obtain additional entries, including through multiple or duplicate accounts will result in disqualification.

4.         **Identity of Entrant**

Bulk or automated entries will be disqualified (including, for example, entries made using any script, macro, bot, or promotional service).  Multiple participants are not permitted to share the same email account.  Any attempt to obtain additional entries through fraud or other illegitimate means will result in disqualification, at Sponsor’s discretion.

In the event of a dispute about the identity of the entrant, entries will be declared made by the authorized account holder of the email address submitted with the Form answers.  An “authorized account holder” means the natural person who is assigned to an e-mail address by an Internet access provider, online service provider or other organization (e.g., business, educational institution, etc.) that is responsible for assigning e-mail addresses for the domain associated with the submitted e-mail address.  A potential winner may be required to provide Sponsor with proof that a potential winner is the authorized account holder of the account associated with the winning entry.

5.         **Selection and Notification of Winner**

On or around 4th November 2022, Sponsor will select the names of one (1) winner of the prize in a random drawing from among all eligible entries at Sponsor’s headquarters as listed in Section 16 below.  The odds of winning depend on the number of eligible entries received.

Each potential winner will be notified via direct message on the platform on which they entered on or about 7th November 2022.  To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, Sponsor may require each potential winner to sign and return, within five (5) days of being notified, an Affidavit of Eligibility and

Liability/Publicity Release in order to claim his/her/their prize.  If (i) the attempted notification is returned as undeliverable without a forwarding address; (ii) any required documents are not returned within five (5) days, such as the Affidavit of Eligibility and Liability/Publicity Release; or (iii) if potential winner is otherwise unable to accept the prize as stated, the prize will be forfeited and may be awarded to an alternate winner.  Only one alternate drawings will be held, after which the remaining prizes will not be awarded.  If, by reason of a print or other error, more prizes are claimed than the number set forth in these Official Rules, an alternate winner will be selected in accordance with the above selection process from among all eligible claimants making purportedly valid claims to award the prizes available.

Verification of Potential Winner:  EACH POTENTIAL WINNER IS SUBJECT TO VERIFICATION BY SPONSOR, WHOSE DECISIONS ARE FINAL AND BINDING IN ALL MATTERS RELATED TO THE SWEEPSTAKES.  AN ENTRANT IS NOT A PRIZE WINNER UNLESS AND UNTIL ENTRANT’S ELIGIBILITY HAS BEEN VERIFIED AND ENTRANT HAS BEEN NOTIFIED THAT VERIFICATION IS COMPLETE AND NO FURTHER ACTION IS NEEDED.

6.         **Prize**

One (1) winner will receive one (1) Fluke 393 FC Solar Clamp Meter.  Approximate Retail Value (“ARV”) of Fluke FC 393 Solar Clamp Meter is: $729.99.  One (1) winner will be selected from entrants who entered to win via Instagram.

Prize Restrictions: ALL FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL TAXES ASSOCIATED WITH THE RECEIPT OR USE OF ANY PRIZE ARE THE SOLE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE WINNER.  Prizes are not transferable.  No substitutions or exchanges of prize (including for cash) will be permitted, except that Sponsor reserves the right to substitute a prize of comparable or greater value for any prize.  Sponsor will not replace any lost or stolen prizes or prize components. Only the number of prizes stated in these Official Rules are available to be won in the Sweepstakes.

Except for applicable manufacturer’s standard warranties, the prizes are awarded “AS IS” and WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, express or implied (including, without limitation, any implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose).

7.         **Use of Use of Winner's Name, Likeness, etc.**

Except where prohibited by law, entry into the Sweepstakes constitutes permission to use each winner’s name, hometown, aural and visual likeness and prize information for advertising, marketing, and promotional purposes without further permission or compensation (including in a public-facing winner list).  As a condition of being awarded any prize, except where prohibited by law, winner may be required to execute a consent to the use of their name, hometown, aural and visual likeness and prize information for advertising, marketing, and promotional purposes without further permission or compensation.  By entering this Sweepstakes, you consent to being contacted by Sponsor for any purpose in connection with this Sweepstakes.

8.         **Assignment of Rights in Form Answers/No Confidentiality**

Entry materials and Forms will not be returned to entrants.  By entering the Sweepstakes, you hereby assign all right, title, and interest in your Form answers to Sponsor, including without limitation all associated copyright, trademark, patent, and other proprietary rights therein. Without limiting the foregoing, you acknowledge that Sponsor will own all rights to use, adapt, edit, modify, translate, reproduce, publish, perform, display, distribute, make derivative works of and otherwise commercially and non-commercially exploit concepts, ideas, and  improvements in your Form answers in perpetuity and throughout the world, in any manner or medium now existing or later developed, without separate compensation to you or any other person or entity.  You agree to take, at Sponsor's expense, any further action (including executing documents) requested by Sponsor to effect, perfect or confirm the Sponsor rights set forth in this paragraph.

By entering this Sweepstakes, you realize that Sponsor may have access to, or may independently create content, product improvements, and material similar or identical to, the information provided in your Form answers, and you agree that you will not be entitled to any compensation by reason of the use by Sponsor of such similar or identical material.  You understand and agree that all Form answers submitted to Sponsor will not be treated as confidential, and you agree not to include or disclose any trade secrets or other confidential or proprietary information in any Form answers.

9. **Winner List; Rules Request**

For a copy of the winner list, send an email to reply@fluke.com after 10th November 2022 and before 1st December 2022 to the address listed in Section 13 below, Attn: 393 Solar Clamp Meter Sweepstakes.  To obtain a copy of these Official Rules, visit [https://lnk.bio/fluke](https://lnk.bio/fluke "(opens in a new window)").

10.       **Disclaimer**

Sponsor and each of its parent companies, subsidiaries, and affiliates, and each of their respective directors, officers, equity owners, professional advisors, distributors, representatives, employees and agents (collectively, the “Released Parties”) will not be responsible or have any liability for: (a) any late, lost, misrouted, garbled or distorted or damaged communications, transmissions or requests; (b) telephone, electronic, hardware, software, network, Internet, or other computer- or communications-related malfunctions or failures; (c) any Sweepstakes disruptions, injuries, losses or damages caused by events beyond the control of Sponsor or by non-authorized human or other intervention; or (d) any printing or typographical errors in any materials associated with the Sweepstakes.

Sponsor and the Released Parties are not responsible for: (a) authorized distributors that do not participate in the Sweepstakes; (b) participating authorized distributors that sell products at the price they determine; or (c) participating authorized distributors mishandling transactions and/or shipments of product.

11.       **Limitation of Liability**

Except where otherwise prohibited by law, by participating in the Sweepstakes, you release and agree to indemnify and hold harmless each Released Party from any liability, obligation, injury, claim, suit, action, cost, expense, loss or damage of any kind, including any tax liability or loss of opportunity, whether direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential, that may be imposed on, asserted against or incurred by such Released Party that arise out of or relate in any way to this Sweepstakes and the gifts offered hereunder, including, but not limited to, where arising out of or relating to the following: (a) any technical difficulties or equipment malfunction (whether or not under Sponsor’s control); (b) any theft, unauthorized access or third party interference; (c) any redemption request that is late, lost, altered, damaged or misdirected (whether or not after their receipt by Sponsor, and whether or not in Sponsor’s control); (d) any damages due to the operation of the postal service; (e) any variation in Sweepstakes value to that stated in these terms and conditions; (f) any tax liability incurred by participant; or (g) use or misuse of the products offered under the Sweepstakes.

12.       **Miscellaneous**

The Sweepstakes and these terms and conditions will be governed, construed and interpreted under the laws of the State of Washington, USA without applying any conflicts or choice of law provisions under such law that might refer the construction or interpretation of any term hereof to the laws of any other jurisdiction.  Any action brought regarding the Sweepstakes and these terms and conditions may only be brought in the state or federal courts located in the State of Washington, and each party to such action expressly consents to jurisdiction of those courts.  If any provision of these terms and conditions is held illegal or unenforceable in a judicial proceeding, such provision shall be severed and shall be inoperative, and, provided that the fundamental terms and conditions of these terms and conditions remain legal and enforceable, the remainder of these terms and conditions shall remain operative and binding.

# Opportunity Coupon Offer Terms & Conditions

1. **Coupon Description**

Eligible end customers who participate in this Discount Coupon Offer (the “Coupon Offer”) during the Coupon Offer Period (as defined in Section 3) and meet all the requirements as set forth in these terms and conditions of the Coupon Offer are eligible to receive a discount as further described below.

Under the Coupon Offer, eligible end customers of Fluke, Fluke Networks, Amprobe, and Pacific Laser Systems, which are divisions of Fluke Electronics Corporation and Fluke Electronics Limited Partnership (“Sponsor”) who purchase “Qualifying Fluke Products” (as defined below) from Sponsor, authorized distributor, or authorized reseller during the Coupon Offer Period will receive a Discount Coupon (as defined in Section 3) from a representative of Sponsor (“Fluke Representative”) as detailed below. See the list of authorized distributors at [https://www.fluke.com/en-us/where-to-buy](https://www.fluke.com/en-us/where-to-buy).

For purposes of this Coupon Offer, the term “Qualifying Fluke Products” means only the Fluke, Fluke Networks, Amprobe, and Pacific Laser Systems products listed on the Discount Coupon issued by a Fluke Representative. The discount allowed is equal to the amount indicated on the Discount Coupon (as defined in Section 3), which is not to exceed more than 10%.

2. **Eligibility**

For purposes of the Coupon Offer, a customer must be at least 18 years of age, and a resident of the 50 United States, the District of Columbia, or Canada.

Only customers that are end-users and use the Qualifying Fluke Products for their own purposes are eligible to participate in the Coupon Offer. Distributors, resellers, and similar parties are expressly excluded from directly participating in the Coupon Offer.

Employees, directors and officers of the Sponsor, its parent companies, affiliated companies, subsidiaries, distributors, representatives, and those persons’ immediate families (parents, siblings, children and spouse) and persons living in the same household (whether related or not) are not eligible to participate in the Coupon Offer. Further, no employees, officers, directors, representatives or agents of (i) government entities, including government owned or controlled companies, (ii) distributors or (iii) competing tool manufacturers are eligible to participate in the Coupon Offer.

3. **Instructions on How to Participate in the Coupon Offer**

In order to receive a discount under the Coupon Offer, all eligible end customers must follow the process stated below during the Coupon Offer Period (as defined in Section 4).

Eligible end customers must obtain a discount coupon from an authorized Fluke Representative (the “Discount Coupon”). The authorized distributor or authorized reseller will reach out to a Fluke Representative to coordinate the Discount Coupon details.  The Discount Coupon must include the customer’s name, address, email address, date of issue, products offered for discount, quantity of each product offered for discount, and approval code. The Discount Coupon must be completed by a Fluke Representative to be valid.

End customers must present completed Discount Coupon to an authorized Fluke distributor or reseller. Authorized Fluke distributor or reseller will modify existing Fluke product quote to indicated discount. Authorized Fluke distributors and resellers are not obligated to honor the Discount Coupon. End customers must independently verify that their preferred distributor will participate in the Coupon Offer.

4. **Coupon Offer Period**

In order to qualify for the Discount Coupon, an eligible end customer must purchase Qualifying Fluke Products within thirty (30) days of the Discount Coupon issue date indicated on the Discount Coupon. Any purchases beyond thirty (30) days from date of issue are not eligible for discount. Coupon Offer starts at 12:00 AM PST on January 1, 2024, and ends 11:59 PM PST on December 31, 2024 (the “Coupon Offer Period”).

5. **Restrictions and Limitations of the Coupon Offer**

The Coupon Offer is subject to all applicable federal, state, and local laws and regulations and is void where prohibited by law.

The discount available under this Coupon Offer may not be combined with any other discounts, coupons, credits, rebates or other special offers (except the Fluke 75th Anniversary Promotion) from the Sponsor applicable to the purchase of a Qualifying Fluke Product.

The rebate available under this Coupon Offer may not be redeemed for alternate products, services, cash, or credits.

**All costs, taxes, customs duties, fees, and expenses associated with a customer’s participation in the Coupon Offer are the responsibility of the customer.**

6. **Disclaimer**

Sponsor and each of its parent companies, subsidiaries, and affiliates, and each of their respective directors, officers, equity owners, professional advisors, distributors, representatives, employees and agents (collectively, the “Released Parties”) will not be responsible or have any liability for: (a) any late, lost, misrouted, garbled or distorted or damaged communications, transmissions or requests; (b) telephone, electronic, hardware, software, network, Internet, or other computer- or communications-related malfunctions or failures; (c) any Coupon Offer disruptions, injuries, losses or damages caused by events beyond the control of Sponsor or by non-authorized human or other intervention; or (d) any printing or typographical errors in any materials associated with the Coupon Offer.

Sponsor and the Released Parties are not responsible for: (a) authorized distributors that do not participate in the Coupon Offer; (b) participating authorized distributors that sell products at the price they determine; or (c) participating authorized distributors mishandling transactions and/or shipments of product.

7. **Limitation of Liability**

Except where otherwise prohibited by law, by participating in the Coupon Offer, you release and agree to indemnify and hold harmless each Released Party from any liability, obligation, injury, claim, suit, action, cost, expense, loss or damage of any kind, including any tax liability or loss of opportunity, whether direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential, that may be imposed on, asserted against or incurred by such Released Party that arise out of or relate in any way to this Coupon Offer and the gifts offered hereunder, including, but not limited to, where arising out of or relating to the following: (a) any technical difficulties or equipment malfunction (whether or not under Sponsor’s control); (b) any theft, unauthorized access or third party interference; (c) any redemption request that is late, lost, altered, damaged or misdirected (whether or not after their receipt by Sponsor, and whether or not in Sponsor’s control); (d) any damages due to the operation of the postal service; (e) any variation in Coupon Offer value to that stated in these terms and conditions; (f) any tax liability incurred by participant; or (g) use or misuse of the products offered under the Coupon Offer.

8. **Miscellaneous**

The Coupon Offer and these terms and conditions will be governed, construed and interpreted under the laws of the State of Washington, USA without applying any conflicts or choice of law provisions under such law that might refer the construction or interpretation of any term hereof to the laws of any other jurisdiction. Any action brought regarding the Coupon Offer and these terms and conditions may only be brought in the state or federal courts located in the State of Washington, and each party to such action expressly consents to jurisdiction of those courts. If any provision of these terms and conditions is held illegal or unenforceable in a judicial proceeding, such provision shall be severed and shall be inoperative, and, provided that the fundamental terms and conditions of these terms and conditions remain legal and enforceable, the remainder of these terms and conditions shall remain operative and binding.

The customer is bound by these terms and conditions and by the decisions of Sponsor, which are final and binding in all respects. To the extent permitted by law, Sponsor reserves the right to change these terms and conditions at any time, in its sole and absolute discretion, and to suspend or cancel the Coupon Offer or any customer’s participation in the Coupon Offer should technical failures, computer viruses, fraud, human error, unauthorized human intervention or other causes beyond Sponsor’s control affect the administration, security, proper functioning, integrity or conduct of the Coupon Offer, Sponsor otherwise becomes (as determined in its sole and absolute discretion) incapable of conducting the Coupon Offer as planned, or for any other reason determined by Sponsor to be appropriate in its sole and absolute discretion.

These terms and conditions constitute the entire agreement governing the Coupon Offer and binding the customer, and no other agreement, verbal or otherwise, shall be binding regarding the Coupon Offer unless it is in writing and signed by Sponsor. In case of any conflict or inconsistency between any other documents relating to the Coupon Offer and these terms and conditions, these terms and conditions shall control. To the maximum extent provided by law, no waiver of any provision of these terms and conditions will be implied from any course of dealings between the customer and Sponsor or from any failure by the customer or Sponsor to assert its rights hereunder on any occasion or a series of occasions. Eligibility to participate in the Coupon Offer is non-transferable and non-assignable.

Any customer who violates these terms and conditions, violates any law, rule or regulation in connection with participation in the Coupon Offer, tampers with the operation of the Coupon Offer, or engages in any conduct that is unsportsmanlike, disruptive, or detrimental or unfair to Sponsor, the Coupon Offer or any other participant (in each case as determined in Sponsor’s sole and absolute discretion) are subject to disqualification from participation in the Coupon Offer and all other rights and remedies available under the law.

Sponsor’s use of the customer’s personal information provided to Sponsor is subject to Sponsor's Privacy Policy (available at http://en-us.fluke.com/site/privacy). If you have any questions about these terms and conditions or the Coupon Offer, please email them to fluke-info@fluke.com or send written questions to the address: 6920 Seaway Blvd., Everett, WA 98203.

9. **Sponsor’s Address Information**

Fluke Electronics Corporation: 6920 Seaway, Blvd., Everett, WA 98203. Fluke Electronics Limited Partnership: 400 Britannia Rd E, Unit 1, Mississauga, L4Z 1X9.

10. **Copyright Notice**

The Coupon Offer and all accompanying materials, including these terms and conditions, are copyright © 2022 by Fluke Corporation. All rights reserved.
